thread.title: Samsung Galaxy S8 live image leaked; price, specifications and launch date tipped as well
thread.title_full: Samsung Galaxy S8 live image leaked; price, specifications and launch date tipped as well

title: Samsung Galaxy S8 live image leaked; price, specifications and launch date tipped as well
text:
Samsung Galaxy S8 live image leaked; price, specifications and launch date tipped... Samsung Galaxy S8 live image leaked; price, specifications and launch date tipped as well By - January 27, 2017 “The Galaxy S8 will allegedly arrive in 5.8-inch and 6.2-inch variants, both featuring curved Super AMOLED panels” 
Samsung’s upcoming flagship, the Galaxy S8, has been the subject of a number of leaks and reports recently. We have already seen a couple of alleged renders of the handset along with a few live images. Now ahead of the unveiling, the Galaxy S8 has been captured again, revealing key details regarding its design. 
The live image of the Galaxy S8, posted by Evan Blass aka @ evleaks on Venture Beat , reveals that the phone will not sport a physical home button, a first for the Galaxy S series. The phone’s fingerprint sensor appears to be relocated to the back panel alongside the camera module. The phone will feature a dual-edged curved display, a USB Type-C port and a 3.5mm headphone jack. 
The tipster further suggests that the Galaxy S8 will arrive in two variants – one with a 5.8-inch display and the other with a 6.2-inch screen, both featuring a dual-curved Super AMOLED panels. The smaller model will get a 3,000mAh battery, while the bigger variant will feature a 3,500mAh battery. The device will be powered by either a Qualcomm Snapdragon 835 SoC or Samsung’s next Exynos chipset, depending on the region. 
As per the source, the Galaxy S8 will feature 4GB of RAM, a 64GB base storage variant, a microSD card slot, a 12MP rear snapper, an 8MP front shooter, an Iris scanner, Android Nougat and the Bixby virtual assistant. The device is also expected to come with the Samsung DeX experience, a Continuum-like desktop functionality. 
The source suggests that the Galaxy S8 will be made official at an event in New York on March 29th. The 5.8-inch variant of the device will be priced at around Rs 58,150, while the 6.2-inch model cost around Rs 65,500, adds the report.
